basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Haymar Phyoe, a Senior AI Engineer at CID, UMG. I specialize in AI strategy, NLP, speech processing, and data analysis. My passion is to drive AI innovation while upholding ethical AI practices. Excited to share my work with you!

projects.title: Burmese-Topic-Modeling
projects.description: This is for training Burmese topic modeling using BERTopic. BERTopic is an open-source topic modeling technique that leverages the power of BERT embeddings to identify and cluster topics in a given text corpus.

projects.title: Burmese-POS-Tagger-Flair
projects.description: This is a high-accuracy Burmese Part-of-Speech (POS) model using Flair with two embedding methods, one is custom gensim word2vec model and the other is with stacked of two FlairEmbedding models (forward and backward)

projects.title: Burmese-BERT-Models
projects.description: This work consists of two training pipelines of Burmese BERT models for Masked Language Modeling (MLM) task and Next Sentence Prediction (NSP) task.

projects.title: Burmese-POS-Tagging-Model
projects.description: This is a high-accuracy Burmese Part-of-Speech (POS) model Based on Transformer. The goal is to enhance NLP applications for the Burmese language and support linguistic research and localization efforts.

projects.title: Burmese-Spell-Corrector-Model
projects.description: This is spell corrector for the Burmese language using a sequence-to-sequence model with attention. The model is trained on a parallel dataset of corrected spelling data along with corresponding incorrect spelling data, comprising over 100,000 sentences with syllable break information.

experience.title: Senior AI Engineer
technologies: Git and related platforms (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket)
